name: Survivor (itch) (Vision)
description: This is a ruins on the sky. A group of monsters are walking in front of you. You must pick up the balls which fall from the sky and throw them to tht monsters. Before you have been killed, beat all the monsters and take victory in the last. Note: Grasp the time when the ball fall from the sky , waving your hands and leting the ball drop to the direction of the monsters.
